tab.creator: Sortzailea
bot.overwrite-current: Zure momentuko replay berridatziko da. Ziur al zaude?
bot.load-fail: Hurrengo replay-a kargatzeko arazoak izan dira: {}
bot.delete-invalid.msg: Ezabatu nahi duzun replay hautatu, mesedez.
bot.confirm-delete: Ziur zaude {} ezbatu nahi al duzula?
bot.ignore-inputs.desc: Replay bat berrikustean, sarrerak erregistratzea sahiesten ditu.
bypass.checkpointlimit.desc: Praktika moduan, 50 checkpoint baino gehiago kokatzeko.
bypass.instantcomplete.desc: Maila bat irekitzean, automatikoki berehala gainditzen du.
bypass.levelkick.desc: Maila bat kargatu ondoren, jokuak zuri kanporatzea sahiesten du.
bypass.practicemusic.desc: Praktika moduan, modu arrunteko musika entzuteko ahalmena desblokeatzen du.
bypass.musiccustomizer.desc: Menuan eta praktika moduan nahi duzun musika aukeratzeko.
bypass.showspamcomments.desc: 'Show' botoia sakatu gabe, spam bezala kalifikatutako iradokizunak erakusten ditu. (Beat-ek sortuta)
bypass.unlockicons.desc: Garajean ikono eta kolore guztiak desblokeatzen ditu.
bypass.unlockpaths.desc: Path of Power guztiak desblokeatzen ditu.
bypass.unlockmainlevels.desc: Jokuko maila nagusi guztiak desblokeatzen ditu.
bypass.unlockshops.desc: Baldintzak bete gabe, denda guztietan sartu ahal izateko.
bypass.unlockvaults.desc: Jokuaren bobeda eta sekretu guztiak desblokeatzen ditu.
creator.hidetriggers.desc: Editorean playtesting egitean, trigger guztiak ezkutatzen ditu.
creator.nocopymark.desc: Zure mailak igotzean, copy marka kentzen du.
creator.resetpercentonsave.desc: Gordetzean edo egiaztatzeko egoera berrezartzean, mailaren portzentaia %0-ra berrezartzen du. (TechStudent10-k sortuta)
creator.sliderlimit.desc: Barra irristakorretan, gutxieneko eta gehieneko mugak kentzen ditu.
creator.smoothtrail.desc: Editorean playback egitean, aztarna leuntzen du.
global.audiospeed.sync.desc: Speedhack piztuta badago, audioaren abiadura horrekin bat egiteko.
global.vsync.desc: Sinkronizazio bertikala aldizkatzeko, screen tearing sahiesteko erabilgarria.
global.compacteditorlevels.desc:
Neurrizko editore-mailak nabigatzean, bistaratze trinkoa pizten du.
(Cvolton-eko kodetik egokituta, RayDeeUx-ek sortuta)
global.compactprofilecomments.desc:
Profiletan iradokizunak ikustean, bistaratze trinkoa gaitzen du.
(Cvolton-eko kodetik egokituta, RayDeeUx-ek sortuta)
global.discordrpc.update-rate.desc: Egoera zenbatean behin eguneratu behar den.
global.discordrpc.time-mode.desc:
RPC-an denbora nola erakusten den ezartzen du.
Itzalita: Denbora erakutsiko ez da.
Jolasaldiaren Guztira: Jokuaren barruan guztira zenbat denbora egon zaren erakusten du.
Mailaren Jolasaldia: Momentuko mailaren barruan soilik zenbat denbora egon zaren erakusten du.
Totala+Mailaren Jolasaldia: Bai menuetan igarotako denbora, bai mailaren barruan igarotako denbora totala erakusten ditu.
global.lockcursor.desc: Jolastean, kurtsorea lehioaren barruan giltzaperatzen du.
global.autosafemode.desc: Tranpak piztuta daudenean, modu segurua automatikoki pizten da ere.
global.autosafemode.warn-popup.desc: Edozein maila batean sartzean, momentuan piztutako tranpak zerrendatzen duen lehio bat erakusteko.
global.safemode.warn-popup.desc: Edozein maila batera sartzean, Modu Segurua piztuta dagoela esaten duen jakinarazpen bat erakusten du.
global.tpsbypass.desc: Jokuaren tick-abiadura aldatzeko. Ezustekoak sor ditzake.
global.show-taps.desc: Pantailan non ukitu duzun ikusteko, borobil bat agertzen da.
global.show-taps.fill.desc: Borobil zirriborratu baten ordez, borobil bete bat marrazten du.
interface.dpi-scaling.desc: Jokuaren lehioaren arabera interfazearen neurria doitzeko.
interface.font-not-found:
Hizkuntz hau letra-tipo gehigarri bat behar du.
Hura jaitsi nahi al duzu?
interface.font-download-fail: Arazo bat gertatu da letra-tipoa jaistean. Arazoaren kodea: {}
float-btn.title: Botoi Flotatzailearen Ezarpenak
keybinds.in-game-only.desc: Maila barruan bakarrik tekla bizkorrak erabiltzeko.
keybinds.hint: Tekla bati lotzeko, edozein botoi edo aldizkagailu batean eskuineko klik egin ezazu!
keybinds.press-key: Edozein tekla sakatu ezazu tekla bikorra aldatzeko...
keybinds.press-esc: ESC sakatu ezazu prozesua bertan behera uzteko...
labels.cheat-indicator.visible.desc: Edozein tranpa piztuta daudenean, adierazle gorri bat erakusteko.
labels.cheat-indicator.endscreen.desc: Shows the cheat indicator on the level end screen.
labels.cheat-indicator.only-cheating.des: Hides the cheat indicator if you're not cheating.
labels.cheat-indicator.scale.desc: Changes the size of the cheat indicator.
labels.cheat-indicator.opacity.desc: Changes the opacity of the cheat indicator.
labels.cheat-indicator.alignment.desc: Changes the alignment of the cheat indicator.
labels.show-in-editor.desc: Whether to render labels in preview mode.
labels.name: Name
labels.events.delay.desc: The delay before the event is triggered.
labels.events.duration.desc: How long the event lasts after condition is no longer met.
labels.events.easing.desc: Transition time between entering and leaving the event.
labels.delete-prompt.msg: Are you sure you want to delete this label?
level.accuratepercentage.desc: Allows for more decimals in a level percentage, and adds other useful utilities.
level.allpassable.desc:
Allows you to pass through blocks that are normally solid.
(Created by km7)
level.alwaysshowcoins.desc: Always shows the uncollected variant of the coins.
level.autoldm.desc: Automatically enables LDM upon entering a level.
level.autopickupcoins.desc: Automatically picks up all coins in a level.
level.autopracticemode.desc: Automatically enables practice mode when entering a level. (Created by Uproxide)
level.autosongdownload.desc: Auto-download song and SFX files when viewing an online level. (Created by Uproxide)
level.checkpointdelay.desc: Removes one frame of delay when placing checkpoints.
level.confirmrestart.desc: Prompts you before you restart the level.
level.confirmfullreset.desc: If you are in a platformer level, this will prompt you before restarting to the beginning.
level.confirmpractice.desc: Prompts you before you start in practice mode.
level.confirmpractice.confirmexitpractic: Prompts you before you exit practice mode.
level.forceplatformer.desc: Forces platformer mode when playing a level.
level.freeze_attempts.desc: Freezes the number of attempts in a level.
level.hidelevelcomplete.desc: Hides the explosion, fireworks, and particles seen when completing a level. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.hidepause.desc: Hides the pause menu. Useful for taking screenshots of levels.
level.hitbox_multiplier.desc: Modifies the scale of hitboxes in the game.
level.layoutmode.desc: Removes all decoration associated with a level.
level.legacypulse.desc: Restore the pulse effect from older versions. (Created by Tpdea)
level.legacypulse.force_fps.desc: Enable fixed FPS for legacy pulse simulation.
level.legacyreversephysics.desc: Forces old upside down physics among other old physics changes.
level.matchlabelfonts.desc: Matches the level percentage/level time UI element's font with the font used in a level. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.mutelevelsfx.desc: Disables SFX/Edit SFX triggers. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.noglow.desc: Disables all glow coming from objects.
level.noendshake.desc: Disables the shaking effect when you complete a level.
level.nomusicfadeout.desc: Music set to fade out in a level no longer fades out. (Created by Beat)
level.noparticles.desc: Hides portal, coin, custom, etc particles in levels.
level.noparticles.nomiscparticles.desc: Includes portal, dash orb, coin, end wall particles, etc...
level.noparticles.nocustomparticles.desc: Includes particles created by the level author.
level.noportallightning.desc: Disables lightning effects when passing through size change portals and more.
level.noshader.desc: Disables all shaders in the game.
level.pausecount.desc: Shows a countdown when unpausing the game.
level.pauseduringcomplete.desc: Allows you to pause during the level complete cutscene.
level.platgamemodes.desc: Unlocks Wave and Swing in platformer mode.
level.practicecoins.desc: Allows you to collect coins in practice mode.
bot.practicefix.desc: Properly saves and restores the player's data when respawning from a checkpoint.
level.randomseed.desc: Sets a seed of choice for all random triggers.
level.randomseed.constantseed.desc: Changes the seed mid level, otherwise only set it when attempt starts.
level.showhitboxes.desc: Shows hitboxes for all objects in the level.
level.smartstartpos.desc:
Makes the start positions automatically pick the correct gamemode and speed.
(This only works in levels without directional changes.)
level.startpos_switcher.desc: Allows you to switch between start positions in the level.
level.startpos_switcher.label: Show Label
label.startpos_switcher.buttons.desc: Toggles between showing and hiding the arrow buttons in the StartPos Switcher UI.
level.stoptrigondeath.desc:
Stops all triggers from continuing when you die.
(Warning: May break some levels that rely on death trigger)
level.stoptrigondeath.platformer.desc:
Allows triggers to stop when dying while in platformer.
(Warning: This may mess up your awarded points)
level.legacytrail.desc: Restore the trail effect from older versions.
level.zeropercentpractice.desc: Treats completions from 0% in Practice Mode as Normal Mode completions.
player.autoclick.desc: Clicks periodically when playing levels. Applies to both the level editor and actual levels.
player.autokill.desc: Kills the player at a certain time or percentage.
player.autokill.percentage.desc: Kills the player at a certain percentage.
player.autokill.time.desc: Kills the player at a certain time.
player.ballrotation.desc: Restores the rotation bug when changing gamemode from ball to another gamemode.
player.ballrotation.variation.desc: Adds variation when the ball spins.
player.clicktp.desc: Teleport player to the mouse cursor's position when right clicking.
player.customwavetrail.desc: Customize the wave trail color and size.
player.forceghosttrail.desc: Always shows the player ghost trail.
player.framestepper.desc: Allows you to step through the game frame by frame.
player.jumphack.desc: Allows the player to infinitely jump in the air.
player.mutelevelaudioondeath.desc: Mutes all level audio (Music + SFX) on player death. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.muterewardssfx.desc: Disables all rewards SFX (orbs, diamonds, keys) when the player dies. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.noplatformersquish.desc:
Disables the squishing animation when jumping in place inside platformer levels.
Applies to both the level editor and actual levels. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.norespawnflash.desc: Removes the blinking effect on respawn.
player.norobotfire.desc: Disables the robot's fire when jumping.
player.nowavetrailbehind.desc: Force the player trail off exclusively for the wave.
player.shipcopter.desc: Adjusts the controls of the swing gamemode to behave like the ship gamemode. (Created by Beat)
player.showtrajectory.desc: Shows where the player will be if they click/don't click.
player.solidwavetrail.desc: Makes the player wave trail a solid color.
player.wavetrailondeath.desc: Makes the player wave trail not disappear upon death.
player.wavetrailondeath.persist-trail.de: Prevents the player wave trail from disappearing even after changing gamemodes.
recorder.hide-preview.desc: Makes the screen blank while rendering, which can improve performance.
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.title: Uncomplete Level?
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.msg:
Are you sure you want to uncomplete "{}"?
You can't undo this process.
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.error: You have to open the level first!
shortcuts.toggle-practice.desc: Switch between practice and normal mode.
shortcuts.place-checkpoint.desc: Place a checkpoint in practice mode.
shortcuts.inject-dll.desc: Pick a DLL file to inject.
shortcuts.recount-secret-coins.desc: "Fixes" your secret coin count by recounting based on the main levels, map packs, and secrets.
shortcuts.recount-secret-coins.title: Fix Secret Coins?
shortcuts.recount-secret-coins.nochange: There was no change in the amount of secret coins you have!
shortcuts.recount-secret-coins.error: You have more secret coins ({}) than the recounted amount ({})!
shortcuts.recount-secret-coins.msg:
You have less secret coins ({}) than the recounted amount ({})! Would you like to change that?
You can't undo this process.
shortcuts.show-level-password.desc: Shows a popup of the level password for the level.
shortcuts.show-level-password.error: A password could not be found for the level you are playing!
shortcuts.show-graphic-settings.desc: Open the graphics settings menu, even if it's inaccessible.
